full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI LAS BYUNG DPAL CHEN DGYES PA'I ROL KAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (RTA MGRIN SKYER SGANG LUGS 'DI SNYE MO ZHU YAS GYI GTER YIN NA'ANG, LAS BYANG SNGA 'GYUR GTZANG MA ZHIG CHER MI 'DUG PA DANG, GTER GZHUNG DNGOS CHA TSANG YANG DKON PAS, ,BLA MA'I DAG DANG RATNA GLING BA'I GSANG 'DUS NAS BRGYAN TE, TSOGS MCHOD MA GTOGS TSANG ZHING 'KHYER BDE DBANG CHEN GYES PA'I ROL GAR ZHES PA 'DI'ANG RGYA BOD KYI YI GE'I RIGS DU MA DANG RI MO SOGS LA BLO GROS KYI RTZAL DAD LDAN ZHES TSUL BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I DRUNG YIG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS DANG, SNGAGS BON BLO BZANG DON GRUB GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR LA SLAR MA DAG PA RNAMS BCOS TE, ZA HOR GYI BTZUN PA BZHAD PA RTZAL GYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU SBYAR,, ,,)
